label: Compteur d'eau
description: Get the water usage for hour, day, and week time-periods

lastHour.label: Heure précédente
lastHour.description: Water used in the last hour
lastHour.displayTemplate: Water used in the {{attribute}} by {{device.label}} is {{value}} {{unit}}

lastTwentyFourHours.label: Dernières 24 heures
lastTwentyFourHours.description: Water used in the last 24 hours
lastTwentyFourHours.displayTemplate: Water used in the {{attribute}} by {{device.label}} is {{value}} {{unit}}

lastSevenDays.label: 7 derniers jours
lastSevenDays.description: Water used in the last 7 days
lastSevenDays.displayTemplate: Water used in the {{attribute}} by {{device.label}} is {{value}} {{unit}}
